messages.message: Hello Colleagues! A simple-ish question that will have large consequences for my Sol-Eng design for BMO client. Assuming that a job has been successfully submitted via the flow_binary API that then *fails* during the subsequent model or refiner steps (for any reason) ...is it *always* possible to re-run that job ? [assuming the .ibflowbin etc have been updated. Imagine I am trying to ensure that no work is ever lost. So I either have to queue it externally to IB or can rely on IB to never lose work]. @Xi Cheng ?

Hi Rob, if I understand it correctly this is a question related to flow API. Feel free to ask in the <#CV8V33RPV|> channel. My understanding is that one can always retry/rerun 
a flow
cool, so there is no systems reason that flows can get lost?
